title: Uncle Si Loves Dumpster Diving
description:
Si reveals the secret to making bank at the town dump. Ka-ching! Phillip and Si are inspired after meeting a veteran who turned to Jesus after finding a "Duck Commander Faith and Family Bible" on the side of the road. Si and the boys know their wives will never hear a word uttered on the podcast, and there's a good reason for that. Phillip is forced to call the police after discovering what a tenant left behind. Martin, Si, and John-David launch into a fiery debate about fishing lines. And the boys offer advice to a 16-year-old boy who likes a girl but isn't allowed to date till he's 18.
-
